author: whitecapsO
description: Generic Farmware function to move between two grids each move completed in 30Ses

1.name: rowsGrid1
1.label: Number of rows in first grid (0-20):

2.name: colsGrid1
2.label: Number of columns in first grid (0-20):

3.name: spaceBetweenRowsGrid1
3.label: The number of millimeters between each row to move the x axis in first grid:

4.name: spaceBetweenColsGrid1
4.label: The number of millimeters between each column to move the y axis in first grid:

5.name: startXGrid1
5.label: Where to start the x axis from in first grid:

6.name: startYGrid1
6.label: Where to start the y axis from in first grid:

7.name: startZGrid1
7.label: Where to start the z axis from in first grid:

8.name: alternateInBetweenGrid1
8.label: Whether to calculate alternate in between cells in first grid:

9.name: startLastRowOfGrid1
9.label: Start on the last row of first grid and move backwards:

10.name: rowsGrid2
10.label: Number of rows in second grid (0-20):

11.name: colsGrid2
11.label: Number of columns in second grid (0-20):

12.name: spaceBetweenRowsGrid2
12.label: The number of millimeters between each row to move the x axis in second grid:

13.name: spaceBetweenColsGrid2
13.label: The number of millimeters between each column to move the y axis in second grid:

14.name: startXGrid2
14.label: Where to start the x axis from in second grid:

15.name: startYGrid2
15.label: Where to start the y axis from in second grid:

16.name: startZGrid2
16.label: Where to start the z axis from in second grid:

17.name: alternateInBetweenGrid2
17.label: Whether to calculate alternate in between cells in second grid:
